item.description:
Trying to get rid of those stubborn pounds, esp during the holidays? Alittle short on cash and in need of group support and motivation? Sick of yo-yo dieting?
We have a program that is far more economical for all to join. Our program will not only help you to lose those unwanted pounds, it will give you the group support that everyone needs. We have a 90% return rate that most who have been in the program sign up again so they don't lose the momentun and consistent accountability. The cost for the whole program is $29 for the Whole 12 week Program. You get one on one coaching, group support, and free body analysis so you will get the right tool to lose your weight.
Our new Program will be starting On Wednesday, December 1st at 5:30 PM- 7:00 PM at the Conference Room at United Pentacostal Church, 175 South Main St., Attleboro, MA
For more info feel free to call or email me:
Helene Smith
Attleboro Weight Loss Challenge Coach and Organizer
508-942-6326
htsccrn@comcast.net

group.name: The Attleboro Weight Loss Challenge Meetup

item.name: New Attleboro Weight Loss Challenge Program
